Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the town of Goshen's authority to impose a hotel and motel tax
Summary: Extends the town of Goshen's authority to impose a hotel and motel tax of up to five percent for two additional years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 289 of the laws of 2023, amending the tax law relating to authorizing the town of Goshen to impose a hotel and motel tax, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
